overview: Nearly a year after a horrific school shooting, seventeen year old Cecily (Lani Tunzi) is still grieving after losing her boyfriend Mickey (Eric Garcia) to the shooting. However, after a looming force threatens to shut down a vigil for the victims, Cecily must join forces with her friend Nathaniel (Anthony Aguirre) in order to protest against the school and build the strength to attend the vigil.
title: Peace and Recovery
